name: maily
description: Use standard React to create the HTML emails of your imagination without a headache

scripts.build:example: yarn build && babel example --out-dir build/example --presets es2015,stage-2,react,babel-polyfill --plugins syntax-decorators
scripts.build:test: yarn build && babel tests --out-dir build/tests --presets es2015,stage-2,react,babel-polyfill --plugins syntax-decorators  && cp -R tests/result build/tests/
scripts.prepublish: yarn clean && yarn test && yarn clean && yarn build
scripts.test:update: yarn build:test && node build/tests/index.js --update && echo 'Syncing tests update'  && cp -R build/tests/result/* tests/result/

author: inventid <tech@inventid.nl>
